title: About Zordly
text: Zordly is a platform for educational communication in schools, colleges, and offices. It allows users to post announcements, events, and updates relevant to their organization.

title: Features
text: Zordly provides features such as event posting, messaging, group management, and notice broadcasting.

title: Future Scope
text: Zordly plans to integrate video conferencing, AI-powered insights, and third-party tools for productivity enhancement.

title: Contact
text: For inquiries, reach out to contact@zordly.com or visit our website.
